original_text: When you ask, you do not receive, because you ask with wrong motives, that you may spend what you get on your pleasures.
korean_text: 구하여도 받지 못함은 정욕으로 쓰려고 잘못 구하기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: because you ask with wrong motives
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 잘못된 동기로 구하기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: that you may spend what you get
